item.title: With no DOJ breakup, Alphabet becomes a $3 trillion company
item.description: Investors continue to reward Alphabet's stock after a judge declined to break up Google earlier this month.

item.title: Divergent raises $290M to expand production of specialized military parts
item.description: Divergent Technologies' new round will help the company expand its manufacturing footprint across the U.S.

item.title: Robinhood plans to launch a startups fund open to all retail investors
item.description: The “Robinhood Ventures Fund I” is intended to allow any retail investor to make money on startups, but the details are scant.

item.title: The 9 most sought-after startups from YC Demo Day
item.description: We asked YC-focused investors to name the startups from the Summer 2025 batch that generated the most interest.

item.title: Company that owns Gucci, Balenciaga, other brands confirms hack
item.description: Kering said the hackers did not steal credit card numbers and that it has contacted the customers whose data is part of the breach, without saying how...
